description: This is the applet 1, this will take you to a website that allows you to input a text and it automatically shows the text and it also have a display button that when you click it it will dispaly what you just typed
This is the applet 2, this will take you to a website or an applet that renders a Leaflet and Openstreetmap interactive map..

This is the applet 3, this will take you to a website or applet that consists of s button and two disply element that consist of the things such as the thing that shows the logs and date, and the one that shows the total number of logs.
This is the applet 4, this will take you to a website that have an application that applies dynamic elements such as rendering DOM elements from a list
This application is the basic usage of the Openweather API
